column4: Why is there a traffic jam at 2:30am in Bangalore

Bangalore is better. 

Mumbai airport gives me a panic attack. 

Especially the Uber/Ola pick up. 

I will choose a 1 hour traffic jam of Bangkok over 10 mins of Mumbai traffic. 

OEM need to reduce the decibel of honks.
There is no laungauge fight and less traffic jam and its more cheaper also .  Very good ok  than bangalore people dont fight for thier laungauge .
